data.title: William S. Hart Films #1
data.meta_description: DVD-R: Films of William S. Hart (1915) Three classic two reelers on one DVD-R
data.text:
Films of William S. Hart

Volume #1

Three classic two reelers available on one DVD-R. If you've never seen any William S. Hart films before these are a prefect introduction to some excellent silent film entertainment. Way ahead of their time for production values and content. You won't be disappointed.

Keno Bates, Liar (1915)

Directed by William S. Hart

Writing credits J.G. Hawks & Thomas H. Ince

Cast

William S. Hart ... Keno Bates

Herschel Mayall ... Wind River

Margaret Thompson ... Doris Maitland

Louise Glaum ... Anita

Gordon Mullen ... Jim Maitland

Bates must protect a newly arrived sister from the truth about her brother.

Knight of the Trail (1915)

Directed by William S. Hart

Writing credits Thomas H. Ince & Richard V. Spencer

Cast

William S. Hart ... Jim Treen

Leona Hutton ... Molly Stewart

Frank Borzage ... Bill Carey

Treen must tries to restore the love of a woman who discovered his secret outlaw life.

The Ruse (1915)

Directed by William Clifford & William S. Hart

Writing credits J. G. Hawks, Thomas H. Ince, A.P. Johnson & C. Gardner Sullivan

Cast

William S. Hart ... 'Bat' Peters

Clara Williams ... Mary Dawson

John Davidson ... John Folson

Fanny Midgley ... Mrs. Dawson

Gertrude Claire ... Holds Mary prisoner

Shorty Hamilton ... A Cowboy

Bob Kortman ... A Gangster

Hart as 'Bat' Peters Peters comes to the city to be taken in by a con artist.
